alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 7:43PM CST until February 09 at 12:56PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Kiamichi River near Antlers affecting Pushmataha County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kiamichi River near Antlers. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, minor flooding begins along the west bank of the Kiamichi River near Moyers. Campers along the river should move to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 25.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage by late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
